name: Stop mousing around!
description:
You step into the little mouse feet of Jimmy, who is an ordinary house mouse, living in museums. By accident, he took a train to Graz and found a new home in the museum there. The first day at a new location is always pretty hard and it definitely doesn't help, when your two housemates want you to do weird puzzles to give you food.

Guide Jimmy through this museum and help him solve different games and deal with fun NPCs and follow their story.
